name: Free Actions
title: Free Actions
text: Any item, ability, or command with <yellow>yellow</> text doesn't end a player unit's turn. They can even attack afterwards!

name: Caps
title: Stat Caps
text: HP: <yellow-green>20</> for T1, <yellow-green>25</> for T2{br}All Others: <yellow-green>10</>{br}All Units have <yellow-green>MOV</> Growths!

name: Stat Colors
title: Stat Colors
text: As characters gain stats through level ups, the color of the stat changes:{br}<yellow>Yellow: Base</>{br}<light-orange>Orange: +1</>{br}<yellow-green>Green: +2</>{br}<blue>Blue: +3</>{br}<purple>Purple >3</>

name: Wep. Ranks
title: Weapon Ranks
text: Most weapons don't require weapon ranks. Instead, characters gain Hit at rank A and S:{br}{br}A Rank: <yellow-green>+10 Hit</>{br}S Rank: <yellow-green>+20 Hit</>

name: Burning
title: Burning
text: Saraid's Firestarter lights tiles on fire!{br}The fire spreads next turn to adjacent tiles.{br}Units starting their turn on a burning tile take 4 damage.{br}Also, they suffer -1 SKL/SPD/DEF/RES.

name: Building
title: Building Supports
text:
Units can support with any other playable unit but are limited to <yellow-green>1 support partner</> at a time.{br}Supports are unlocked after a chapter where both units are deployed.
Each pair only has 1 support rank.{br}If either unit <red-orange>dies</>, the support is <red-orange>broken</>; allowing the surviving unit to support with a different unit.

name: Bonuses
title: Support Bonuses
text:
Units gain a bonus based on their partner's affinity while <blue>within 3 tiles</> of each other.
<purple>Fire</>: <blue>+2</> <yellow>Damage</>{br}<purple>Wind</>:<blue>+2</> <yellow>Attack Speed</>{br}<purple>Ice</>: <blue>-2</> <yellow>Damage Received</>{br}<purple>Thunder</>: <blue>+15</> <yellow>Crit</>{br}<purple>Light</>: <blue>+15</> <yellow>Avoid</>{br}<purple>Dark</>: <blue>+15</> <yellow>Hit</>
